name: fire_emblem_heros
description: Compute probabilities of getting five star heros conditional on color

scripts.print: jq -r '(.rarities | map(.[:4])) as $cats | .colors as $cols | .events[] | .name, "=" * (.name | length), ([""] + $cols | join("\t")), ([$cats, .condProbs] | transpose | .[] | [.[0]] + (.[1] | map(. * 100 | tostring | .[:6] + "%")) | join("\t")), ""' data.json
scripts.print5: jq -r '(.rarities | map(.[:4])) as $cats | .colors as $cols | .events[] | .name, "=" * (.name | length), ([$cols, (.condProbs[:2] | transpose | map(add | . * 100 | tostring | .[:6] + "%"))] | transpose | .[] | join("\t")), ""' data.json

author: Erik Brinkman
